review: pros very pretty  cons clunky awkward interface very limited tactical options tedious turn structure linear story line basically very small rooms connected by a dull plot very primitive inventory system pc development rigid in the extreme and advances dont seem to have much impact on performance   all in all this might have been decent 1015 years ago but compared to games like jag 3 its just junk  i got it on sale for 10 and am doubtful ill get my moneys worth
